name: Google Play Store Template
description:
Preview your app's promo graphics on the Google Play Store


This template showcases your app icon, feature graphics, and screenshots. Simply replace the frames with your own designs to visualize how they look in the Play Store. Learn more about graphic assets requirements here.


Ps: The app showed in the cover image is MadLads, a game I made a few years ago that allows you to play Mad Libs with your camera. Play it on your phone!
